name: Push-Up
description: A foundational exercise where you lower your chest to the ground and push back up, engaging the chest, shoulders, and triceps.

name: Wide Push-Up
description: Hands placed wider than shoulders to emphasize chest activation over triceps, performed by lowering and raising the body.

name: Diamond Push-Up
description: Hands close together forming a diamond shape, targeting the inner chest and triceps with a challenging push-up variation.

name: Clap Push-Up
description: An explosive push-up where you push off the ground hard enough to clap hands mid-air, building chest power and speed.

name: Archer Push-Up
description: One arm extends to the side while the other bends, mimicking an archer's draw, for unilateral chest strength.

name: Incline Push-Up
description: Hands on an elevated surface reduce difficulty, focusing on lower chest with a standard push-up motion.

name: Decline Push-Up
description: Feet elevated, hands on ground, shifting focus to upper chest and shoulders in a push-up.

name: Plyo Push-Up
description: Push explosively to lift hands off the ground, enhancing chest and shoulder power.

name: Spiderman Push-Up
description: Bring one knee to elbow during a push-up, engaging chest and obliques simultaneously.

name: One-Arm Push-Up
description: Performed with one arm, requiring significant chest, shoulder, and core strength.

name: Pull-Up
description: Hang from a bar and pull your chin above it, targeting lats, biceps, and upper back with a full range of motion.

name: Chin-Up
description: Palms facing you, pull up to engage biceps more than lats, a classic back exercise.

name: Wide Pull-Up
description: Hands wider than shoulders to maximize lat engagement during the pull-up motion.

name: Archer Pull-Up
description: One arm pulls while the other extends sideways, building unilateral back strength.

name: One-Arm Pull-Up
description: Pull your body up with one arm, an advanced move for back and biceps.

name: Front Lever
description: Hold body parallel to the ground from a bar, a static exercise for back and core strength.

name: Back Lever
description: Hang upside down, body parallel to ground, engaging back and posterior chain.

name: Tuck Front Lever
description: Knees tucked to chest while holding parallel, a progression to full front lever.

name: Negative Pull-Up
description: Slowly lower from the top of a pull-up, building strength for full pull-ups.

name: Assisted Pull-Up
description: Use resistance bands to assist in pulling up, ideal for beginners.

name: Commando Pull-Up
description: Alternate grip pull-up, pulling head to one side then the other, targeting back and biceps.

name: Towel Pull-Up
description: Grip towels over a bar to pull up, enhancing grip strength alongside back work.

name: Handstand
description: Balance on hands with feet in the air, building shoulder stability and strength.

name: One-Arm Handstand
description: Balance on one hand, an advanced shoulder and core stability challenge.

name: Pike Push-Up
description: Bend at hips with feet on ground, pushing up to target shoulders in a vertical press.

name: Handstand Push-Up
description: From a handstand, lower head to ground and push back up, a powerful shoulder exercise.

name: Planche
description: Hold body parallel to ground on hands, an intense shoulder and chest static exercise.

name: Tuck Planche
description: Knees tucked while holding parallel on hands, a planche progression.

name: Straddle Planche
description: Legs spread wide in a planche hold, increasing shoulder demand.

name: Wall Handstand
description: Practice handstand against a wall, building shoulder strength and balance.

name: Shoulder Tap
description: In a plank, tap opposite shoulder with one hand, engaging shoulders and core.

name: Tricep Dip
description: Lower body between parallel bars and push back up, targeting triceps effectively.

name: Ring Dip
description: Perform dips on unstable rings, increasing triceps and stabilizer muscle demand.

name: Bench Dip
description: Hands on a bench, feet on ground, dip down to work triceps with less intensity.

name: Korean Dip
description: Dip on a straight bar with body behind, an advanced triceps and chest exercise.

name: Weighted Dip
description: Add weight to dips using a vest or belt, intensifying triceps work.

name: Close-Grip Push-Up
description: Hands close together in a push-up, shifting focus to triceps over chest.

name: Triceps Extension
description: Using a resistance band overhead, extend arms to isolate triceps.

name: Ring Chin-Up
description: Chin-up on unstable rings, increasing biceps and stabilizer engagement.

name: One-Arm Chin-Up
description: Pull up with one arm on a bar, an extreme biceps and back challenge.

name: Biceps Curl
description: Using resistance bands, curl hands toward shoulders to isolate biceps.

name: Dead Hang
description: Hang from a bar as long as possible, building forearm endurance and grip.

name: Finger Pull-Up
description: Pull up using only fingertips on a bar, enhancing forearm and grip strength.

name: Towel Hang
description: Hang from towels over a bar, challenging forearms and grip intensely.

name: Plank
description: Hold a straight body position on forearms and toes, engaging abs for stability.

name: Hollow Body Hold
description: Lie on back, lift arms and legs slightly, forming a 'banana' shape to work abs.

name: L-Sit
description: Hold legs straight out while supporting on hands, targeting abs and hip flexors.

name: Hanging Leg Raise
description: Hang from a bar, raise straight legs to 90 degrees, focusing on lower abs.

name: Dragon Flag
description: Lie on a bench, lift legs and hips straight up, then lower slowly, an advanced ab move.

name: V-Sit
description: Sit with legs and torso lifted in a V-shape, holding to engage abs and hip flexors.

name: Tuck L-Sit
description: Knees tucked while holding an L-sit position, a progression to full L-sit.

name: Ab Rollout
description: Kneel and roll forward with hands on a bench, extending abs fully.

name: Crunch
description: Lie on back, curl shoulders toward pelvis to contract abs directly.

name: Side Plank
description: Support body on one forearm and side of foot, holding to target obliques.

name: Russian Twist
description: Sit, twist torso side to side with feet off ground, engaging obliques.

name: Human Flag
description: Hold body sideways from a pole, an extreme oblique and shoulder exercise.

name: Side Hanging Raise
description: Hang from a bar, raise legs sideways to target obliques.

name: Windshield Wipers
description: Hang from a bar, swing legs side to side like wipers, working obliques.

name: Dead Bug
description: Lie on back, extend opposite arm and leg while keeping core braced, targeting deep abs.

name: Plank with Leg Lift
description: In a plank, lift one leg at a time, enhancing transverse abdominis stability.

name: Bird Dog
description: From all fours, extend opposite arm and leg, balancing to engage deep core muscles.

name: Superman Hold
description: Lie face down, lift arms and legs off ground, holding to strengthen lower back.

name: Back Extension
description: Lie face down on a bench, lift torso up to work lower back muscles.

name: Reverse Hyperextension
description: Lie face down, lift legs up from a bench, targeting lower back and glutes.

name: Leg Raise
description: Lie on back, lift straight legs to 90 degrees, engaging hip flexors and lower abs.

name: Hanging Knee Raise
description: Hang from a bar, raise knees to chest, targeting hip flexors and abs.

name: Squat
description: Bend knees and hips to lower body, then stand, a basic quad and glute exercise.

name: Pistol Squat
description: Squat on one leg with the other extended forward, requiring quad strength and balance.

name: Wall Sit
description: Lean against a wall, hold a seated position, an isometric quad endurance move.

name: Jump Squat
description: Squat down and explode upward into a jump, building explosive quad power.

name: Bulgarian Split Squat
description: One foot elevated behind on a bench, squat with front leg to target quads.

name: Step-Up
description: Step onto a bench with one leg, driving through heel to work quads.

name: Assisted Pistol Squat
description: Use a band for support while performing a single-leg squat.

name: Nordic Hamstring Curl
description: Kneel, lower torso forward with feet anchored, targeting hamstrings with eccentric strength.

name: Single-Leg Romanian Deadlift
description: Hinge at hips on one leg, lowering torso to work hamstrings and improve balance.

name: Glute-Ham Raise
description: On a bench, curl body up from knees, an advanced hamstring and glute exercise.

name: Hamstring Curl with Band
description: Lie prone, curl legs against band resistance, isolating hamstrings effectively.

name: Natural Glute-Ham Raise
description: Kneel and lower body using hamstrings without equipment, a bodyweight variation.

name: Glute Bridge
description: Lie on back, lift hips by squeezing glutes, a basic activation exercise for glute strength.

name: Single-Leg Glute Bridge
description: Lift hips with one leg extended, targeting glutes unilaterally with added challenge.

name: Hip Thrust
description: Rest shoulders on a bench, thrust hips up with feet flat, focusing on glute power.

name: Donkey Kick
description: On all fours, kick one leg back and up, isolating the glutes for strength and tone.

name: Weighted Hip Thrust
description: Add weight across hips during a hip thrust, intensifying glute activation.

name: Calf Raise
description: Stand, lift heels off ground, working calves with bodyweight in a simple motion.

name: Single-Leg Calf Raise
description: Lift heel on one leg, increasing calf strength and stability unilaterally.

name: Bench Calf Raise
description: Stand on a bench edge, raise heels for greater range, targeting calves.

name: Jump Calf Raise
description: Explosively jump while raising heels, building calf power and explosiveness.

name: Weighted Calf Raise
description: Hold a weight or wear a vest, raise heels to increase calf resistance.

name: Side Lunge
description: Step to the side and squat, targeting adductors and improving lateral mobility.

name: Cossack Squat
description: Wide stance squat shifting weight side to side, stretching and strengthening adductors.

name: Adductor Plank
description: In a side plank, lift top leg slightly, engaging adductors for stability.

name: Sumo Squat
description: Wide stance squat with toes out, emphasizing adductors and inner thighs.

name: Adductor Side Raise
description: Lie on side, lift bottom leg up against gravity, isolating adductors.

name: Side-Lying Leg Raise
description: Lie on side, lift top leg up, isolating abductors for hip stability.

name: Clamshell
description: Lie on side with knees bent, open knees like a clam to work abductors.

name: Standing Abduction
description: With a band around legs, push one leg out to the side against resistance.

name: Abductor Walk
description: With a band around legs, step sideways, keeping tension to target abductors.

name: Fire Hydrant
description: On all fours, lift one leg out to the side, mimicking a dog at a hydrant, for abductors.

name: Burpee
description: Squat, jump back to plank, push-up, then jump upâ€”a full-body conditioning move.

name: Mountain Climber
description: In plank, rapidly bring knees to chest, working core, shoulders, and legs.

name: Muscle-Up
description: Pull up and transition to a dip on a bar or rings, a full-body gymnastic move.

name: Jumping Jack
description: Jump with arms and legs spreading out and in, a classic full-body warm-up.

name: Tuck Jump
description: Jump and tuck knees to chest mid-air, engaging legs, core, and cardio.

name: Bear Crawl
description: Crawl on hands and feet with knees off ground, a full-body strength and mobility move.

name: Frog Stand
description: Balance on hands with knees resting on elbows, a beginner step toward planche.

name: Crow Pose
description: Similar to frog stand but with knees outside elbows, improving wrist and core strength.

name: Skin the Cat
description: Rotate backward through a hang on rings or bar, a mobility and back lever progression.

name: Ring Row
description: Pull body up from a low hang on rings, targeting back and biceps with adjustable difficulty.

name: Hollow Rock
description: Rock back and forth in a hollow body position, enhancing core stability.

name: Supine Leg Raise
description: Lie on back, lift legs to vertical then lower slowly, targeting lower abs and hip flexors.

name: Parallel Bar Support
description: Hold body upright between parallel bars, building shoulder and triceps stability.

name: Muscle-Up Negative
description: Lower slowly from the top of a muscle-up, a progression for the full move.

name: Straddle L-Sit
description: Hold legs spread wide in an L-sit, advancing core and hip flexor strength.

name: Front Lever Pull
description: From a hang, pull into a front lever and hold briefly, building dynamic strength.
